about_the_game:
Navy War is a realistic multiplayer naval combat game of the First and Second World War!

Action army games and team battles are waiting for you!

Steer a legendary battleship of yesteryear, use naval tactics and destroy enemy ships!

Direct your fleet to glorious victory! What are you waiting for, captain?!

ONLINE PvP

Exciting PvP naval battles - command and attack teams of players from all over the battleship. Prove that you are the best captain in this war game and your fleet is invincible.

VARIOUS SHIPS OF THE FIRST AND SECOND WORLD WARS

Lots battleships of your choice! From Aurora to Yamato!

Choose a fraction you like and fight back against your opponent!

TACTICAL ADVANTAGE

Choose the warship that suits best your PvP style.

When placing ships, be sure to come up with new ideas, constantly change old concepts, use flexible tactics, and improve your strategy to successfully suppress the enemy!

DEVELOP AND IMPROVE YOUR FLEET

The upgrade systems allow you to create a unique fleet for a military sea shooter.

Improve the combat characteristics of battleships, equipment, and weapons.

Use emblems, special torpedoes, and consumables to change the course of the combat!

AWARDS AND TOURNAMENTS

Participate in weekly tournaments, and win prizes and awards! Complete daily quests and challenges for even greater rewards!

GREAT GRAPHICS

Realistic graphics, colorful special effects, detailed vehicles, wonderful arenas for naval battles, and the irreplaceable military spirit!

Ready for the naval battle?

Online ships are waiting for you!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Steam OS, Linux Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Quad core CPU 3.3 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 630 or similar (2GB VRAM)
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Additional Notes: recent binary ATI or NVidia drivers (MESA may not work reliably)
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Graphics: video card with 3072 MB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.9 (Mavericks)
  • Processor: Quad core CPU 3.3 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 630 or similar (2GB VRAM)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.8
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: video card with 1024 MB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Navy War: Battleship Games

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™2 Quad Q6600 & AMD Athlon II X4 640 AM3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 or AMD Radeon RX 460 or Intel HD 630 (2GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8.0, 8.1, 10, 11
  • Processor: 4 GHz
  • Graphics: video card with 1024 MB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Ready for the naval battle? Online ships are waiting for you!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Vietnamese, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Dutch, Russian, Japanese
